name: Damien MIKELL, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of January, 2011, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
